title: [Lan Party] Lyon e-Sport #10

embed.title: Lyon e-Sport #10: Ouverture des inscriptions le 21/12 !
embed.description: Après l'Astrogaming Cup, l'Acensi University League et le Challenge France, Lyon e-Sport est heureuse de vous annoncer aujourd'hui la Lyon e-Sport #10 ! Une édition anniversaire pour laquelle l'association compte bien marquer le coup ! L'événement se tiendra au Palais des Sports de Lyon les 3, 4 et 5 mars 2017.

body:
Lyon e-Sport is very pleased to announce today its next main event: the Lyon e-Sport #10!

From the 3rd to the 5th of March 2017 will take place this anniversary edition at the Palais des Sports in the French city of Lyon. The League of Legends tournament will be open to 64 teams, pushing and tower diving all week-end for a 20 000€ cash prize!

Brace yourself! Registrations will open on the Wednesday 21st of December at 8pm CET.

You can find all information on our website: http://www.lyon-esport.fr/news/lyon-e-sport-10-online-registration-21st-december/


About Lyon e-Sport:
We are a bunch of eSport passionates, all volunteers, willing to promote it in France. Created in 2011, the non-profit organization has grown fast and is today preparing its 10th edition, opening it to foreign teams and fans.

Feel free to contact me for any request at thomas.renaud@lyon-esport.fr
